archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.11d: d) protecting privacy-related metadata (e.g. document attributes or descriptive information that may contain personal information such as the name of the person who last updated a file).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
